channel.title: Python on 权掌天下 Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Python on 权掌天下 Blog

item.title: 一行 Python 代码能实现这么多丧心病狂的功能？
item.description: 一行代码打印乘法口诀 print('\n'.join([' '.join(["%2s x%2s = %2s"%(j,i,i*j) for j in range(1,i+1)]) for i in range(1,10)])) 一行代码打印迷宫 print(''.join(__import__('random').choice('\u2571\u2572') for i in range(50*24))) 一行代码表白爱情 print('\n'.join([''.join([('Love'[(x-y) % len('Love')] if ((x*0.05)**2+(y*0.1)**2-1)**3-(x*0.05)**2*(y*0.1)**3 <= 0else' ') for x in range(-30, 30)]) for y in range(30, -30, -1)]))！ 一
